Returns: a @B_android#support#test#espresso#ViewAction_E@ that navigates on a menu item
Parameters: int: the resource id of the menu item
navigateTo(int).Description: Returns a @B_android#support#test#espresso#ViewAction_E@ that navigates to a menu item in @B_android#support#design#widget#NavigationView_E@ using a menu item resource id. View constraints: View must be a child of a @B_android#support#v4#widget#DrawerLayout_E@ View must be of type @B_android#support#design#widget#NavigationView_E@ View must be visible on screen View must be displayed on screen
